titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-(Methoxycarbonyl)benzylsulfonamide.
